Area: cortex, mPFC, OFC, ACC, and M2

Prep: hybrid depth electrodes from human epilepsy patients

Signals: OGB-1, morphological, genetic and immunohistochemical metadata

Task/Stimuli: associative learning (tone conditioned stimulus (CS) and a periorbital stimulation unconditioned stimulus (US))
gratings, natural movies, natural scenes, sparse noise

Prep: pharmacological and optogenetic inactivation of medial prefrontal cortex or dorsal hippo-campus

Task/Stimuli: self-paced reaches to targets arranged in a grid
